text: "Gun.  Sword.  Gunsword.  Screw bayonets, this is way more awesome."
"Not sure if wielding this thing makes me feel like a bodybuilder or a theoretical physicist.  Both?"
"This ain't your grandaddy's .50 cal hand cannon!"
"Nice pistol!  Which trigger fires the flamer?"
"Why in the name of fuck did I slap a crossbow on this handgun."
